name: test_e2e_with_logs[EMRG_MONGO_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `EMRG_MONGO_005` |
| **Name** | MongoDB JavaScript code injection |
| **Category** | OTHER |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; return db.users.find(); //`
- **Encoded**: `%27%3B%20return%20db.users.find%28%29%3B%20//`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Rule ID** | `EMRG_NOSQL_001` |
| **Expected Rule** | Emerging Threat: NoSQL/MongoDB Injection |
| **Actual Rule** | [NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=EMRG_MONGO_005-1765107925827-wamzz pattern_id=EMRG_MONGO_005 uri=/?q=%27%3B%20return%20db.users.find%28%29%3B%20// client=127.0.0.1 |
| **Match Status** | `MISMATCH` |

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~1000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:45:25.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=EMRG_MONGO_005-1765107925827-wamzz pattern_id=EMRG_MONGO_005 uri=/?q=%27%3B%20return%20db.users.find%28%29%3B%20// client=127.0.0.1
